name: Dark Parables: Curse of Briar Rose
name_original: Dark Parables: Curse of Briar Rose
description:
Dark Parables: Curse of Briar Rose is a game developed by Blue Tea Games. It came out on 11-03-2010. Big Fish Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Dark Parables: Curse of Briar Rose on PC.
